headline: ExxonMobil Announces Leadership Changes
summary: SPRING, Texas, April 02, 2025--ExxonMobil (NYSE: XOM) today announced Karen T. McKee, president of ExxonMobil Product Solutions Company and vice president Exxon Mobil Corporation, will retire effective May 1, 2025. The Board of Directors has appointed Matt Crocker president, ExxonMobil Product Solutions Company and vice president Exxon Mobil Corporation. He will succeed McKee effective May 1, 2025.
